Jesus and your guardian angels are pointing you above your farms, your cattle, and your earthly treasure, to the 
                                                                           169
kingdom of heaven, to an immortal inheritance, an eternal substance in the kingdom of glory. Said the angel: "You must die to this world." "Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him."
